# guard_spawner_accuracy enumeration

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/guard_spawner_accuracy
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:37:01.216394

---

Used with `guard_spawner_device.Accuracy` to define how accurate the NPC is when it fires at targets.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Fortnite.com/Devices }` |

## Enumerators

The `guard_spawner_accuracy` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `Low` | Not accurate, missing most shots fired. |
| `Moderate` | Somewhat accurate, hitting targets occasionally. |
| `High` | Fairly accurate, hitting targets consistently. |
| `VeryHigh` | Very accurate, hitting most shots fired. |
